scripts.test:models:mysql: cd tests/models && NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_ADAPTER=mysql SKIP_FIXTURES=true node --test --test-concurrency 1
scripts.test:models:sqlite: cd tests/models && NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_ADAPTER=sqlite SKIP_FIXTURES=true node --test --test-concurrency 1
scripts.test:e2e:mysql: NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_ADAPTER=mysql start-server-and-test 'pinstripe reset-database-and-dump-sql && npm run start -- --without-bot' http://127.0.0.1:3000 'npm run playwright:run'
scripts.test:e2e:sqlite: NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_ADAPTER=sqlite start-server-and-test 'pinstripe reset-database-and-dump-sql && npm run start -- --without-bot' http://127.0.0.1:3000 'npm run playwright:run'
